data.name: Tabbris Yor
data.detailed_description:
Tabbris Yor is a role playing game in which you serve as a Special Agent for private security firm. In the final release of the game, you will be immersed in epic adventures and challenges throughout the solar system. In this Beta-release, alien terrorists have fled to a human outpost on Ganymede, the largest moon of Jupiter. You have been assigned to track them down and eliminate them. You are outnumbered - do you have the experience and the skills to accomplish your mission?

The game features challenging enemy AI, a weapon which you can load and unload, kill-counter, ammo and health counter, pedestrians that flee gunfights, an awesome sci-fi environment and your very own cyberpunk apartment!
data.about_the_game:
Tabbris Yor is a role playing game in which you serve as a Special Agent for private security firm. In the final release of the game, you will be immersed in epic adventures and challenges throughout the solar system. You are outnumbered - do you have the experience and the skills to accomplish your mission?

The game features challenging enemy AI, a weapon which you can load and unload, kill-counter, ammo and health counter, pedestrians that flee gunfights, an awesome sci-fi environment and your very own cyberpunk apartment!
data.short_description: Tabbris Yor is a sci-fi TPS shooter (with switchable camera to FPS). Serving as a private security agent of a human colony on Ganymeade, the largest moon of Jupiter's largest moon, your mission is to find each of the aliens and eliminate them - before they eliminate you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA TITAN; AMD RADEON
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
